sentences.sContent: Which band had a hit with ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’?
sentences.sCn: 《波希米亚狂想曲》是哪支乐队风行一时的歌曲？

...The electronic industry is maturing even though no wonder products hit the market...

trans.tranOther: something such as a film, play, song etc that is very popular and successful
